meta.description: Complete discovery call booking flow with qualification and scheduling logic
meta.contextForAI: Use this flow to guide prospects through qualification and scheduling. Always prioritize high-quality leads and ensure proper preparation for Russell's time.

stages.name: Interest Identification
stages.objective: Determine if prospect is genuinely interested in discovery call
stages.script:
I'd be happy to help you schedule a 15-minute discovery call with Russell. This complimentary session is designed specifically for executives who want strategic clarity on AI opportunities.

Before we schedule, let me make sure this is the right fit. What specifically interests you about the discovery call?
qualifiers: Genuine interest in AI strategy (not just curiosity)
Timeline for AI initiatives within 12 months

stages.name: Lead Qualification
stages.objective: Ensure prospect meets criteria for Russell's time investment

questions.question: What's your role in the company?
questions.followUp: Perfect - as [role], you have the strategic perspective that makes these discussions most valuable.

questions.question: What's the size of your company in terms of revenue or employees?
questions.purpose: Ensure company size matches program value
questions.followUp: That's exactly the type of organization where strategic AI planning creates significant competitive advantage.

questions.question: What industry are you in?
questions.followUp: Excellent - I have several success stories from [industry] that Russell will be able to share with you.

questions.question: What's driving your interest in AI strategy right now?
questions.followUp: That's exactly the type of [challenge/opportunity] where strategic AI planning makes the biggest impact.

questions.question: What's your timeline for making decisions about AI strategy?
questions.followUp: That timeline makes sense for strategic AI planning - it gives us time to develop a comprehensive approach.

questions.question: Do you typically make decisions about strategic investments like executive training, or are others involved?
qualifyingAnswers: I'm part of the decision team
questions.followUp: Great - having decision-making authority or strong influence ensures we can move forward effectively if there's a good fit.

preferred: Current AI challenges or failed initiatives

stages.name: Calendar Scheduling
stages.objective: Schedule the discovery call at optimal time for both parties
stages.script:
Based on what you've shared, I think Russell will be able to provide significant value in your 15-minute discovery call. Let me help you find the perfect time.

The call will cover:
✅ Quick assessment of your AI readiness
✅ 2-3 specific recommendations for your situation
✅ Clear next steps for implementation
✅ Understanding of potential ROI and timeline

What time preferences work best for your schedule?

timePreferences.benefits: Great for strategic thinking when your mind is fresh
timePreferences.script: Morning calls work excellently for strategic discussions. Russell typically has availability between 8 AM and 11 AM Eastern Time.

timePreferences.benefits: Allows time to review materials beforehand
timePreferences.script: Afternoon works perfectly. Russell often has availability between 1 PM and 4 PM Eastern Time.

timePreferences.benefits: Good for West Coast executives and end-of-day planning
timePreferences.script: Evening calls can work well. Russell sometimes has availability between 5 PM and 7 PM Eastern Time.

conversions.PST/PDT: I'll convert that to your Pacific time
conversions.CST/CDT: Perfect - I'll show you Central time options

calendlyIntegration.trigger: Once time preference and timezone are established
calendlyIntegration.script:
Perfect! I'm opening Russell's calendar for you now. You'll be able to select the exact time that works best, and the system will automatically send confirmation details.

After you book, you'll receive:
• Calendar invite with dial-in information
• Brief preparation guide (optional but helpful)
• Russell's background and relevant case studies for your industry

The scheduling link should open in a new window. Do you see it?
calendlyIntegration.fallback: If you don't see the scheduling window, I can send the link directly to your email. What's your email address?

stages.name: Booking Confirmation
stages.objective: Confirm booking details and set expectations
stages.script:
Excellent! I can see you've selected [day] at [time]. Russell is looking forward to speaking with you.

You should receive a confirmation email within the next few minutes with all the details. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder.

To make the most of your 15 minutes, I recommend:
• Having your main AI challenge or opportunity in mind
• Being ready to discuss your industry and business context
• Thinking about your timeline for AI initiatives

Is there anything specific you'd like Russell to focus on during the call?

preparation.optional: The preparation guide I'm sending is optional but helpful
preparation.specific: If you have specific questions or challenges you'd like to discuss, feel free to include them in the calendar invite notes
preparation.materials: I'll also send a brief overview of Russell's background and some relevant case studies from your industry

followUpActions: Send confirmation email with call details
Add prospect to CRM with qualification notes
Alert Russell to prospect's specific situation and interests
Schedule follow-up reminder 24 hours before call

stages.name: Pre-Call Nurturing
stages.objective: Maintain engagement and ensure call attendance

timeline.24_hours_before: Reminder email with agenda and dial-in details
timeline.2_hours_before: Final reminder with any last-minute preparation suggestions

confirmation_email.subject: Your Discovery Call with Russell Deming - [Date] at [Time]
confirmation_email.content:
Thank you for scheduling your 15-minute AI strategy discovery call with Russell Deming.

**Call Details:**
• Date: [Date]
• Time: [Time] [Timezone]
• Duration: 15 minutes
• Format: [Phone/Video]

**What to Expect:**
• Quick assessment of your AI readiness
• 2-3 specific recommendations for your situation
• Clear next steps for implementation
• Understanding of potential ROI and timeline

**To Prepare (Optional):**
• Think about your main AI challenge or opportunity
• Consider your timeline for AI initiatives
• Review the attached industry-specific case studies

Looking forward to our conversation!

Best regards,
Russell's AI Assistant

reminder_24h.subject: Tomorrow: Your AI Strategy Call with Russell Deming
reminder_24h.content:
This is a friendly reminder about your 15-minute discovery call with Russell Deming tomorrow.

**Call Details:**
• Time: [Time] [Timezone] 
• Dial-in: [Phone] or [Video Link]

**Quick Prep (2 minutes):**
• What's your #1 AI challenge or opportunity?
• What's driving your interest in AI now?
• What timeline are you working with?

Russell is looking forward to providing valuable insights for your specific situation.

See you tomorrow!

disqualificationHandling.respectful_decline: I appreciate your interest in our programs. Based on what you've shared, our Executive AI Masterclass might not be the perfect fit right now.

alternative_offerings.ai_audit: However, our AI Opportunity Audit might be perfect for your situation. It's a quick 2-minute assessment that identifies your biggest AI opportunities with no commitment required.
alternative_offerings.resources: I can also send you some valuable resources about AI strategy that might be helpful as you explore your options.
alternative_offerings.future_contact: Feel free to reach out again when your situation changes - we're always here to help.

common_disqualifiers.too_small: For companies under $5M revenue, we typically recommend starting with our free resources and the AI Opportunity Audit
common_disqualifiers.no_authority: For individual contributors, our public resources and webinars might be more appropriate than executive-level consulting
common_disqualifiers.no_timeline: When you have a clearer timeline for AI initiatives, we'd be happy to discuss how we can help
common_disqualifiers.just_curious: For general AI education, I'd recommend our blog and free resources as a great starting point

qualificationScoring.methodology: Weighted scoring system with must-have criteria and preferred attributes

actions.highly_qualified: Schedule immediately, alert Russell to high-value prospect
actions.marginally_qualified: Schedule but with lower priority, additional qualification during call
actions.not_qualified: Politely decline and offer alternative resources

crm.lead_capture: All qualified prospects automatically added to CRM
crm.qualification_notes: Include all qualification responses and scoring
crm.follow_up_tasks: Automatic tasks created for pre-call preparation
